mapper.select: select ROWNUM, bono, mno, mname, bocontents, botitle, bohits, recnt, IF(DATE_FORMAT(bodate, '%Y%m%d') < DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d'), DATE_FORMAT(bodate, '%Y.%m.%d'), DATE_FORMAT(bodate, '%H:%i') ) as bodate, bostatus from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS ROWNUM, B.* FROM (select b.*, m.mname mname, (select count(*) from reply where bono = b.bono) as recnt from board as b inner join member as m on b.mno = m.mno where botype=0 order by bono desc) B, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0 ) TMP) C where ROWNUM <= #{endNo} and ROWNUM >= #{startNo}
SELECT b.bono, b.botitle, b.bohits, m.mname, bostatus FROM board b INNER JOIN member m WHERE b.mno = m.mno AND botype = 0 ORDER BY b.bono desc LIMIT 5;
